sqlMap.insert: insert into comm_post_comments (comment_no, comment_emp_no, comment_content, comment_post_no) values (comm_comments_seq.nextval, #no#, #content#, #postNo#)
sqlMap.select: select c.comment_no as commentNo, c.comment_emp_no as commentEmpNo, c.comment_content as commentContent, c.comment_deleted as commentDeleted, c.comment_created_date as commentCreatedDate, c.comment_updated_date as commentUpdatedDate, c.comment_deleted_date as commentDeletedDate, c.comment_post_no as commentPostNo, e.emp_name as empName from comm_post_comments c, comm_employees e where c.comment_emp_no = e.emp_no and comment_deleted = 'N' and c.comment_post_no = #value#

select comment_no as no, comment_emp_no as empNo, comment_content as content, comment_deleted as deleted, comment_created_date as createdDate, comment_updated_date as updatedDate, comment_deleted_date as deletedDate, comment_post_no as postNo from comm_post_comments where comment_no = #value#
